summary: App with an AI chatbot offering distinct subject-specific modes (Math, Social Studies, Science, Language Arts) with a school-themed vibe.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Chalkboard-style app header banner with subtle classroom doodles (school-header.dim_1600x500.png)
- Friendly school mascot (e.g., pencil/book character) in a clean vector style (school-mascot.dim_512x512.png)
- Seamless notebook paper background texture, light and unobtrusive (notebook-texture.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a school-themed landing/home experience that lets the user choose one of four study modes: Math Help, Social Studies Help, Science Help, and Language Arts Help, and then enter the chatbot interface for the selected mode.
Implement a chatbot UI with a message thread, user text input, send action, and basic chat affordances (loading state, error state, clear conversation) that works for all four modes.

Make each mode’s bot behavior unique by providing mode-specific tutoring patterns and structured outputs: Math Help (step-by-step problem solving format), Social Studies Help (timeline/causes-effects and key terms format), Science Help (hypothesis/evidence/conclusion format and safety reminders), Language Arts Help (thesis/outline/grammar and revision checklist format).
Persist per-user chat history per mode in the backend so that returning to a mode restores the prior conversation for that user (based on Internet Identity principal).
Apply a cohesive “school vibe” visual theme across the app (colors, typography, layout, and components) and keep it consistent across home and chat screens.
Add generated static image assets that support the school theme and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not fetch images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: AI chatbot with distinct subject modes: Math Help, Social Studies Help, Science Help, Language Arts Help (each tailored to its subject).
School-themed look and feel ("school vibe") for the app UI/UX.

Add backend support for subject-specific chatbot responses by implementing a single Motoko canister API that accepts: selected mode, user message text, and (optionally) conversation context; returns a text response tailored to that mode.

projectName: School-themed study helper chatbot with subject-specific modes
